boardgame.name: Vinhos Deluxe Edition
비뉴스 디럭스 에디션
boardgame.description: Vinhos (the Portuguese word for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;wines_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;) is a trading and economic game about the business of wine making. Despite its small size, Portugal is one of the world's leading wine producers. Over six years of harvests, cultivate your vines, choose the best varieties, hire the best oenologists, take part in trade fairs, and show your opponents you are the best winemaker in the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As winemakers in Portugal, the players develop their vineyards and produce wine to achieve maximum profit. The object of the game is to produce quality wines that can be exchanged for money or victory points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Vinhos Deluxe Edition features new art from Ian O'Toole, all components and improved rules of the original game of Vinhos, and a new simplified version of the game. The board is double-sided and features both versions of the game. Here are the main differences from the first edition of Vinhos:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Double-sided player boards can be used in both game versions_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A ninth region has been added_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A new estate has been added_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Farmer (a new character) has been added_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The Fair has been streamlined with new mechanisms_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 18 actions tiles to replace the manager's actions_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 22 multiplier tiles to final scoring_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The bank action has been removed_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The zero initial Vintage tile has been removed_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; The exportation action has been optimized for 2 players_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A few small rules like the limit on experts was removed and the action replaced for another vineyards action_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; No exceptions on a number of things you can do in your turn, now you can buy, hire, sell, export 1 or 2 things in every action_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Explanation of gameplay was reduced a lot_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; New solo rules designed for the new game version_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: preorder english / italian edition
KS Deluxe edition.

New in shrink. Base game without the Kickstarter stretch goals. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a heavy one, so expect a higher than normal shipping. (This box weights about 10 lbs) Let me know if you have any questions.
